marketing.headline.primary: Discover Your Portuguese Community Across the United Kingdom
marketing.headline.secondary: Where Portuguese Culture Meets British Life
marketing.value_prop.main: The vibrant social platform where Portuguese speakers across the UK come together - from intimate Fado nights to passionate football celebrations, cultural festivals to weekend adventures. Experience the richness of Portuguese culture while making Britain your home!
marketing.pricing.headline: Join the UK's Portuguese Social Community
marketing.pricing.tagline: Your vibrant Portuguese community experience across the UK
marketing.testimonial.template: "Finally found my Portuguese tribe across the UK! From Manchester's football nights to Edinburgh's cultural festivals - every weekend brings new adventures with people who truly get our culture!" - Maria, 32, Manchester

cape_verde.culture.title: Cape Verdean Cultural Heritage - Music & Soul
cape_verde.culture.description: Experience the heartfelt beauty of Cape Verdean culture through soul-stirring Morna music, energetic Coladeira celebrations, incredible community spirit, and amazing island food traditions. Cape Verde's unique blend of African, Portuguese, and island influences creates a culture of warmth, hospitality, and emotional depth.
cape_verde.music.morna.title: Morna - Cape Verde's Blues
cape_verde.music.morna.description: Discover Morna, Cape Verde's most emotional music genre - heartfelt, melancholic songs that touch the soul with their beautiful musical storytelling and deep cultural meaning. Like the blues, Morna expresses the deepest emotions of island life.
cape_verde.music.coladeira.title: Coladeira - Joyful Celebration
cape_verde.music.coladeira.description: Join the infectious joy of Coladeira dance - Cape Verde's most upbeat music that brings communities together in celebration with energetic rhythms and movements that make everyone smile and connect.
cape_verde.music.funana.title: Funaná - High-Energy Island Music
cape_verde.music.funana.description: Experience the high-spirited accordion music of Funaná that gets Cape Verdean communities moving with its infectious energy and traditional rhythms that create pure joy.
cape_verde.music.batuko.title: Batuko - Women's Musical Circles
cape_verde.music.batuko.description: Join the powerful tradition of Batuko - women's music circles featuring incredible vocal harmonies, storytelling, and cultural bonding through the beautiful art of collective singing.
cape_verde.food.cachupa.title: Cachupa - Heart of Cape Verdean Food
cape_verde.food.cachupa.description: Learn to prepare Cachupa, Cape Verde's national dish that brings families together - an incredible one-pot meal with rich island flavors that represents the heart of Cape Verdean hospitality and food culture.
cape_verde.community.spirit.title: Amazing Community Spirit
cape_verde.community.spirit.description: Experience the incredible warmth and welcoming nature that makes Cape Verdean culture so special - where island hospitality creates lasting bonds and everyone is family.
cape_verde.language.creole.title: Cape Verdean Creole - Speaking from the Heart
cape_verde.language.creole.description: Connect through Cape Verdean Creole, the unique linguistic heritage that carries the soul of the islands and connects Cape Verdean hearts worldwide with its beautiful expressions and cultural depth.

angola.elite.title: Angola Elite Network
angola.elite.subtitle: Africa's Diamond Capital Meets London's Financial Elite
angola.elite.description: Exclusive networking for successful Angolan entrepreneurs and business leaders. Connect with London's most sophisticated Portuguese-speaking community through our premium events celebrating Angola's natural wealth and cultural sophistication.
angola.elite.upgrade_message: Angola Elite Network events are exclusively available to Premium members. Upgrade to connect with London's most successful Angolan professionals.
angola.directory.title: Angola Luxury Directory
angola.directory.subtitle: London's Premier Angolan Business Network
angola.directory.description: Discover London's most sophisticated Angolan-owned and Angolan-focused businesses. From Michelin-worthy restaurants to exclusive investment services, connect with the finest establishments serving Angola's elite diaspora community.
angola.directory.search_placeholder: Search luxury businesses, services, or specialties...
angola.directory.list_description: Join London's most exclusive Angolan business directory. Showcase your luxury services to the affluent Angolan diaspora and sophisticated Portuguese-speaking community.
angola.diamond_capital.title: Angola: Africa's Diamond Capital
angola.diamond_capital.subtitle: Unlock the Wealth of a Nation Rich in Natural Resources
angola.diamond_capital.description: Discover exclusive investment opportunities in Angola's $12 billion diamond industry, $45 billion oil sector, and emerging luxury real estate market. Connect with London's most sophisticated Angolan business network and access Africa's most promising wealth-building opportunities.
angola.diamond_capital.final_description: Join London's most exclusive network of Angolan investors and entrepreneurs. Access premium investment opportunities in Africa's diamond capital and connect with the sophisticated wealth-building community that bridges London and Luanda.
angola.events.diamond_capital_series: Angola: Africa's Diamond Capital - Investment Series
angola.events.oil_gas_elite: Oil & Gas Elite: Angola-UK Strategic Partnership Dinner
angola.events.contemporary_art: Angola Contemporary Art: Private Gallery Opening
angola.events.private_consultation: Private Angolan Business Consultation & Strategy Session
angola.culture.kizomba.title: Sensual Kizomba Social Dancing
angola.culture.kizomba.subtitle: Magnetic Connection Night
angola.culture.kizomba.description: Experience the absolutely magnetic allure of kizomba - Angola's sensual partner dance that creates incredible connections
angola.culture.kizomba.highlights: Live musicians, professional instruction, sensual partner dancing, romantic atmosphere
angola.culture.semba.title: Vibrant Semba Community Dancing
angola.culture.semba.subtitle: Energy That Gets Everyone Moving
angola.culture.semba.description: Feel the incredible energy of semba - Angola's original community dance that brings people together in celebration
angola.culture.semba.highlights: Traditional drumming, community dancing, cultural presentations, authentic food
angola.culture.kuduro.title: Electric Kuduro Urban Dance Party
angola.culture.kuduro.subtitle: High-Energy Movement & Modern Angola
angola.culture.kuduro.description: Experience the electric energy of kuduro - Angola's high-octane urban dance that gets entire communities moving
angola.culture.kuduro.highlights: Live DJ sets, athletic dance moves, competitions, urban street food, visual projections
angola.culture.music_festival.title: Incredible Angolan Music Festival
angola.culture.music_festival.subtitle: From Traditional to Contemporary Sounds
angola.culture.music_festival.descriptio: Immerse yourself in the incredible diversity of Angolan music - from traditional drumming to contemporary afrobeat fusion
angola.culture.music_festival.highlights: Multiple stages, live performances, instrument workshops, food vendors, art installations
angola.culture.muamba.title: Amazing Muamba de Galinha Experience
angola.culture.muamba.subtitle: The Heart of Angolan Family Feasting
angola.culture.muamba.description: Experience the incredible flavors of muamba de galinha - Angola's beloved national dish that brings families together
angola.culture.muamba.highlights: Authentic cooking instruction, traditional techniques, family-style dining, take-home recipes
angola.culture.nightlife.title: Angolan Nightlife Tour
angola.culture.nightlife.subtitle: Discover London's Vibrant Angolan Social Scene
angola.culture.nightlife.description: Explore the incredible energy of London's Angolan nightlife scene with guided tours of authentic venues
angola.culture.nightlife.highlights: Multiple venues, traditional drinks, live music, community leaders, VIP access
angola.culture.drumming.title: Angolan Community Drumming Circle
angola.culture.drumming.subtitle: Powerful Traditional Percussion
angola.culture.drumming.description: Feel the incredible power of traditional Angolan drumming in this community percussion experience
angola.culture.drumming.highlights: Master drummers, traditional instruments, group improvisation, cultural storytelling
angola.culture.street_food.title: Angolan Street Food Journey
angola.culture.street_food.subtitle: Bold Urban Flavors & Community Culture
angola.culture.street_food.description: Discover the incredible bold flavors of Angolan street food culture through London's African markets
angola.culture.street_food.highlights: Market tours, authentic vendors, bold spices, traditional drinks, cultural stories

referral.messages.whatsapp: Join me on LusoTown - the Portuguese community platform across the UK! Use my code {code} and get 25% off your first month. Perfect for connecting with Portuguese speakers. {link}
referral.messages.email.subject: Join the Portuguese Community Across the UK - LusoTown
referral.messages.email.body:
Hi!

I wanted to invite you to join LusoTown, the Portuguese community platform I've been using across the UK. It's been amazing for connecting with other Portuguese speakers, finding cultural events, and accessing Portuguese-speaking services.

Use my referral code {code} when you sign up and you'll get 25% off your first month!

Join here: {link}

Looking forward to seeing you in the community!

Best regards
referral.messages.generic: Join LusoTown - the UK's Portuguese community platform! Use code {code} for 25% off. Connect with Portuguese speakers, discover cultural events, and access Portuguese services. {link}

quick-start.title: Find Your Match Among Portuguese Speakers at Real UK Venues
quick-start.subtitle: Book incredible experiences at authentic Portuguese venues across the UK - create magical memories together at amazing locations from Manchester to Edinburgh, Birmingham to Liverpool, Bristol to Glasgow!
quick-start.quote: "Onde há portugueses no Reino Unido, há sempre alegria e uma mesa para mais um" - Where there are Portuguese people across the UK, there's always joy and room for one more at the table
what-you-can-do.badge: Your UK Portuguese Social Calendar • O Seu Calendário Social no Reino Unido
what-you-can-do.title: Experience the UK's Most Exciting Portuguese Social Scene
what-you-can-do.subtitle: From electric Fado nights that give you chills to exhilarating weekend adventures across the UK, passionate football celebrations in Manchester to vibrant cultural festivals in Birmingham - dive into Britain's most exciting Portuguese social scene with people who truly understand your soul!
what-you-can-do.testimonial: "This community changed my life! Every weekend is a new adventure - last month I danced at Santos Populares in Liverpool, this weekend it's a Fado night in Glasgow. I've made lifelong friends across the entire UK!" - Maria, Edinburgh
what-you-can-do.events.title: 🎆 Experience Britain's Portuguese Magic
what-you-can-do.events.description: Immerse yourself in extraordinary experiences designed for Portuguese hearts across the United Kingdom! From exclusive cultural tours in London to electrifying football celebrations in Manchester, soul-stirring Fado concerts in Edinburgh to magical weekend escapes across the British Isles. Connect, celebrate, and create unforgettable memories with your Portuguese community!
what-you-can-do.events.locations: Cultural Adventures in Manchester • Football Celebrations in Liverpool • Fado Magic in Edinburgh • Weekend Escapes Across Britain
what-you-can-do.groups.title: 🎉 Create Your Portuguese Social Circle
what-you-can-do.groups.description: Whether you're 25 or 65, from vibrant Lisbon or bustling São Paulo, tech innovator or passionate artist - ignite meaningful connections that transform your UK experience! Start exciting groups based on age, shared passions, or celebrate the diverse tapestry of Portuguese heritage together.
what-you-can-do.groups.examples: Vibrant Women 30+ • Young Professionals Network • Cultural Celebration Circle • Portuguese Heritage Society
what-you-can-do.feed.title: 🌟 Stay in the Portuguese Loop
what-you-can-do.feed.description: Never miss a beat of the Portuguese community pulse! Discover exciting weekend events, share your cultural celebration moments, spotlight amazing Portuguese businesses, and join in celebrating each other's victories. Stay connected to the heartbeat of Portuguese life across the UK!
what-you-can-do.feed.features: Live Cultural Updates • Celebration Stories • Portuguese Business Discoveries • Community Victory Moments
what-you-can-do.favorites.title: 🎆 Curate Your Portuguese UK Journey
what-you-can-do.favorites.description: Create your personalized treasure map of Portuguese experiences across the UK! Save that incredible bakery that makes you feel like home, bookmark soul-stirring Fado nights, remember magical cultural moments across Britain that made your heart sing. Build your collection of Portuguese joy!
what-you-can-do.favorites.types: UK Portuguese Gems • Cultural Celebrations Nationwide • Community Businesses • Magical UK Memories
what-you-can-do.host.title: 🌟 Share Your Portuguese Passion
what-you-can-do.host.description: Transform your passion into community magic! Host inspiring workshops for fellow Portuguese entrepreneurs, teach beloved traditional recipes, create exciting networking experiences, or share the richness of our cultural heritage. Build connections, share knowledge, and create income doing what you love!
what-you-can-do.host.examples: Tech Innovation Workshops • Cultural Heritage Classes • Business Success Training • Vibrant Networking Celebrations
host-with-us.badge: For Portuguese Professionals • Para Profissionais Portugueses
host-with-us.title: Share Your Portuguese Passion with Our Vibrant UK Community
host-with-us.subtitle: Join hundreds of passionate Portuguese professionals, creative event organizers, and cultural enthusiasts who share their expertise with our thriving community of Portuguese speakers across the UK. LusoTown connects you with your local Portuguese family through exciting workshops, cultural celebrations, and meaningful experiences!
host-with-us.testimonial: "I've hosted 15 incredible website development workshops through LusoTown and built an amazing Portuguese network spanning from Manchester to Edinburgh! The energy and support from this community is absolutely life-changing!" - Maria Santos, Tech Entrepreneur
host-with-us.professionals.title: Professional Services & Workshops
host-with-us.professionals.description: Showcase your expertise to Portuguese professionals through our platform. LusoTown facilitates connections for website development workshops, business coaching, app creation training, investment seminars, and professional networking events.
host-with-us.professionals.examples: Website Development • Business Coaching • Investment Advice • Cafezinho & Negócios • Networking à Portuguesa
host-with-us.cultural.title: Cultural Events & Experiences
host-with-us.cultural.description: Share Portuguese heritage through cooking classes (Cataplana & Pastéis workshops), Fado nights, Santos Populares celebrations, traditional crafts workshops, and cultural experiences across the UK. Preserve our culture while earning revenue - Unidos pela Língua.
host-with-us.cultural.examples: Cataplana Workshops • Fado Nights • Santos Populares • Morna Soul Sessions • Coladeira Dance Parties • Cachupa Cooking • Batuko Women's Circles • Funaná Accordion • Tertúlias • Convívios • Festa Junina
host-with-us.business.title: Portuguese Business Promotion
host-with-us.business.description: LusoTown connects your Portuguese business, restaurant, shop, or service with customers who share your heritage and values. Build lasting relationships with the Portuguese community through our platform.
host-with-us.business.examples: Restaurants • Shops • Professional Services • Community Services
host-with-us.success.title: Success Stories from Portuguese Hosts
host-with-us.success.subtitle: Real Portuguese professionals building thriving businesses through our community
host-with-us.success.story1.quote: "My Portuguese bakery went from local to UK-wide thanks to LusoTown. I now host monthly baking workshops and my customer base tripled!"
host-with-us.success.story1.author: João Silva, Bakery Owner
host-with-us.success.story2.quote: "I teach Portuguese digital marketing workshops through LusoTown. Built a network of 200+ Portuguese entrepreneurs in just 6 months."
host-with-us.success.story2.author: Ana Costa, Marketing Consultant

host-with-us.cta.title: Ready to Share Your Portuguese Expertise?
host-with-us.cta.description: Join successful Portuguese professionals who are building thriving businesses through our community. From workshops to services, events to cultural experiences - start showcasing your expertise today.
features.title: Why Portuguese Hearts Choose LusoTown
features.subtitle: Your Social & Professional Hub for Portuguese Speakers Living Across the UK
features.events.title: Network and Celebrate Together
features.events.description: LusoTown connects you with organizers of intimate Fado nights to Santos Populares celebrations, tertúlias culturais to business networking events. Meet fellow lusófonos who share your heritage, traditions, and ambitions.
features.groups.title: Find Your People
features.groups.description: Whether you're interested in cultural activities, weekend adventures, or professional development, find your community. We're all from different backgrounds and interests, but we connect and thrive together.
features.business.title: Support Our Portuguese Businesses
features.business.description: Discover Portuguese businesses connected through our platform that understand our saudade - the bakery making pastéis like your avó's, restaurants hosting convívios with bacalhau feasts, services run by people who share our Portuguese values. Unidos pela Língua, prosperamos juntos.
features.resources.title: UK Community Resources
features.resources.description: Book language exchange sessions at Portuguese cultural centers, cultural workshops in authentic venues, and join activities across UK Portuguese neighborhoods.
features.stories.title: Real UK Success Stories
features.stories.description: Real stories from Portuguese speakers who filled their social calendars, preserved their heritage through activities, and built meaningful connections at authentic venues across UK cities.
features.local.title: Regional Communities
features.local.description: Book activities with Portuguese speakers in your region. Join experiences across UK cities - discover Portuguese cultural centers and activity spaces near you.
features.culture.title: Portuguese Cultural Heritage
features.culture.description: Celebrate Portuguese traditions at authentic venues across the UK. From Fado nights at traditional restaurants to festas at Portuguese churches - keep our culture alive in real places.
features.language.title: In-Person Language Exchange
features.language.description: Book exciting Portuguese language sessions with native speakers at cozy coffee shops, vibrant cultural centers, and inspiring activity spaces across the UK. Build real connections through active language exchange adventures!
features.heritage.title: Heritage Preservation
features.heritage.description: Experience Portuguese culture through real cultural activities - book sessions at Portuguese churches, cultural associations, and family-run businesses that celebrate our traditions across the UK.
testimonials.title: From Saudade to Community - Real UK Lives
testimonials.subtitle: Discover how Portuguese speakers found their UK family through cultural experiences, social connections, and natural networking. From cinema nights to dance workshops across UK cities - authentic stories of community, friendship, and shared culture.
footer.description: LusoTown connects Portuguese speakers living across the UK through social and professional experiences. Where Portuguese speakers discover, learn, and thrive together. Unidos pela Língua - United by Language.
footer.newsletter.title: Stay Connected
footer.newsletter.description: Get updates on Portuguese cultural events, social activities, and experiences happening at authentic venues across the UK.
footer.tagline: Book experiences with Portuguese hearts at real venues across the UK

core_features.audience.title: Our Community
core_features.join_title: Ready to Join the UK's Most Exciting Portuguese Community?
core_features.join_description: Connect with {members} Portuguese speakers across the entire United Kingdom! From electrifying cultural events to inspiring professional networking—your amazing Portuguese adventure starts here in every UK city.
core_features.matches.title: Find Your Match
core_features.matches.description: Connect with Portuguese speakers across the UK through cultural compatibility and authentic connections. Find romance, exciting friendships, or inspiring professional partnerships with people who truly share and celebrate your heritage!
core_features.matches.how_it_works: Our cultural algorithm matches based on Portuguese traditions, language preferences, regional connections, and shared interests—creating deeper connections than generic dating apps.
core_features.events.title: Portuguese Events
core_features.events.description: Discover incredible Portuguese cultural events across the UK! From intimate Fado nights in cozy venues to inspiring professional networking in vibrant cities—connect with your amazing community through unforgettable shared experiences nationwide!
core_features.events.how_it_works: Explore culturally focused events organized by Portuguese speakers. RSVP instantly, connect with attendees beforehand, and build lasting connections through shared cultural experiences.
core_features.tours.title: Portuguese-led Tours
core_features.tours.description: Explore the UK with passionate Portuguese guides who bring culture to life! Discover hidden gems, meaningful cultural connections, and authentic experiences created especially for Portuguese speakers living in or visiting any UK city. Your cultural adventure awaits!
core_features.tours.how_it_works: Book unique London experiences led by Portuguese guides who understand your cultural perspective. From Portuguese business districts to hidden cultural gems—see London through Portuguese eyes.
core_features.students.title: Student Community
core_features.students.description: Incredible support network for Portuguese students across the UK! Academic guidance, inspiring professional mentoring, exciting social connections, and practical support through our amazing university partnerships throughout Britain. Your success journey starts here!
core_features.students.how_it_works: Connect with passionate Portuguese students and inspiring mentors at UK universities. Get amazing academic support, career guidance, exciting social connections, and practical advice from students who truly understand and celebrate your cultural heritage!
core_features.community.title: Community Chat
core_features.community.description: Join exciting real-time conversations with Portuguese speakers across the UK. Passionate cultural discussions, event coordination, inspiring professional networking, and meaningful friendship building—fully in Portuguese and English throughout Britain!
core_features.community.how_it_works: Join discussions in London's Portuguese community. Connect in real time with cultural groups, coordinate events, share experiences, and build friendships with Portuguese speakers in your area.
